entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:53 PM CST Monday 23 January 2023
